claim: Neon serverless driver enables PostgreSQL access from Edge via HTTP/WebSockets.
scope: Applies when using Neon database with @neondatabase/serverless driver in Vercel Edge Functions.

evidence.excerpt: Neon serverless driver queries Neon Postgres over HTTP or WebSockets.
evidence.note: HTTP/WebSocket transport replaces TCP for Edge compatibility.

evidence.excerpt: Neon serverless driver works in Edge runtimes via fetch/WebSockets.
evidence.note: Community verification of Edge Runtime support.
